title: [GAMEPLAY] Nasus' Q animation becomes very slow.
body:
What happens is under unique circumstances, Nasus' attack animation with Q becomes slow. 

To reproduce this bug, follow these steps.

1. When Nasus, activate your Q. (around at least two minions/jungle. I used jungle)
2. As you are about to Q a minion (before damage is dealt), quickly switch your target. 
3. Your Q animation should now be slow.
